医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Omega-3 成为焦点：EPA 和 DHA 对运动员健康和表现的影响研究论文回顾了 omega-3 脂肪酸、EPA 和 DHA 对运动员的影响，讨论了它们在炎症控制、认知功能和肌肉维护方面的益处，以及需要进一步研究以充分了解它们的影响。它还讨论了这些补充剂的风险和最佳摄入量，强调了它们在改善运动表现和恢复方面的潜力，并且在推荐剂量下将副作用降至最低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Omega-3s-in-the-spotlight-The-impact-of-EPA-and-DHA-on-athlete-health-and-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Omega-3s-in-the-spotlight-The-impact-of-EPA-and-DHA-on-athlete-health-and-performance.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7341e434-ef8f-40cb-824a-e97826123d0b Mon, 27 Nov 2023 21:23:00 -0500 Omega-3s in the spotlight: The impact of EPA and DHA on athlete health and performance
怀孕期间的歧视可能会损害正在发育的后代大脑众所周知，歧视和文化适应的经历会对人的健康产生有害影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Discrimination-during-pregnancy-can-harm-the-eveloping-offspring-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Discrimination-during-pregnancy-can-harm-the-eveloping-offspring-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe28d6c4-12db-43a2-be83-fa93a6a1ac03 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 21:16:27 -0500 Discrimination during pregnancy can harm the eveloping offspring brain
基于RNA的疗法在动物模型中显示出治疗白血病的希望德国每年约有 13,000 人被诊断患有白血病，这是一个涵盖各种形式血癌的总称。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/RNA-based-therapy-shows-promise-for-treating-leukemia-in-animal-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/RNA-based-therapy-shows-promise-for-treating-leukemia-in-animal-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7e91b23-d466-41ba-9a91-f5c50fdab06f Mon, 27 Nov 2023 20:43:01 -0500 RNA-based therapy shows promise for treating leukemia in animal models
从“新冠白痴”到“变焦疲劳”：大流行的新词还记得“新冠白痴”和“反疫苗者”的第一次抗议吗？在大流行的早期阶段，大量新词进入公众“声音”，但其中许多新词实际上相当短暂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/From-Covidiots-to-zoom-fatigue-The-new-words-of-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/From-Covidiots-to-zoom-fatigue-The-new-words-of-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6808f0c-c915-4135-b528-96affcefb41e Mon, 27 Nov 2023 20:34:47 -0500 From 'Covidiots' to 'zoom fatigue': The new words of the pandemic
半剂量辉瑞新冠肺炎加强剂几乎与全剂量一样有效，且副作用更少研究比较了先前接种 ChAdOx1、BBIBP-CorV 或 Gam-COVID-Vac 的成人的半剂量和全剂量 Pfizer-BioNTech BNT162b2 COVID-19 加强剂。研究发现，半剂量加强疫苗副作用较少，并保持相似的免疫原性，为加强疫苗接种策略提供了可行的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Half-dose-Pfizer-COVID-booster-nearly-as- effective-as-full-dose-with-fewer-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Half-dose-Pfizer-COVID-booster-nearly-as- effective-as-full-dose-with-fewer-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6eeea979-cfb5-43e4-b8b2-7cbaa266e309 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 18:48:00 -0500 Half-dose Pfizer COVID booster nearly as effective as full dose with fewer side effects
OXR1基因的基因突变与大脑发育问题有关研究调查了 OXR1 基因功能丧失突变对人脑神经发育和细胞功能的影响。研究表明，OXR1 缺陷会损害神经分化，增加对氧化应激的敏感性，并改变组蛋白甲基化，影响大脑发育并可能导致神经系统疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Genetic-mutation-in-OXR1-gene-linked-to-brain-development-issues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Genetic-mutation-in-OXR1-gene-linked-to-brain-development-issues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77e20d4a-9780-4c2d-8590-1db27680c66a Mon, 27 Nov 2023 18:30:00 -0500 Genetic mutation in OXR1 gene linked to brain development issues
每天两个猕猴桃安全，可以替代补充维生素C研究调查了连续六周每天食用两个猕猴桃对健康的影响。研究发现代谢和炎症生物标志物没有显着变化，这表明经常食用猕猴桃是安全的，并且可以增加膳食维生素 C 的摄入量，不会对代谢健康产生不利影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Two-kiwi-fruit-every-day-safe-and-can-replace-vitamin-C-supplementation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Two-kiwi-fruit-every-day-safe-and-can-replace-vitamin-C-supplementation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=976c9b66-47ba-4c47-80d4-d0b4ca514622 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 18:20:00 -0500 Two kiwi fruit every day safe and can replace vitamin C supplementation
澳大利亚研究显示，二价 COVID-19 加强剂为老年人提供更强的保护研究比较了二价和单价加强疫苗对 65 岁及以上个体的 COVID-19 死亡率的有效性。研究发现，与单价疫苗相比，二价加强疫苗对 COVID-19 死亡率表现出更高的疫苗效力，尤其是 Omicron 变种。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Bivalent-COVID-19-boosters-offer-stronger-protection-for-seniors-Australian-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Bivalent-COVID-19-boosters-offer-stronger-protection-for-seniors-Australian-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fbe3fa6d-d0a6-438a-b153-58150f077e1b Mon, 27 Nov 2023 18:03:00 -0500 Bivalent COVID-19 boosters offer stronger protection for seniors, Australian study reveals
SECRE技术为自身免疫性疾病的新疗法铺平了道路科学家们开发出了一种潜在的变革性新技术，可以帮助发现和开发一些全球流行的自身免疫性疾病的新疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/SECRE-technique-paves-way-for-new-therapeutics-for-autoimmune-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/SECRE-technique-paves-way-for-new-therapeutics-for-autoimmune-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ef61ec6-77ab-41fa-b6f7-e086f553db82 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 14:24:11 -0500 SECRE technique paves way for new therapeutics for autoimmune diseases
2020 年美国枪伤造成的经济负担将达到 4930 亿美元根据爱思唯尔出版的《美国预防医学杂志》报道的新研究，2020 年美国致命和非致命枪伤造成的经济影响比 2019 年增加了 16%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Economic-burden-of-firearm-injuries-in-the-US-reaches-24493-billion-in-2020.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Economic-burden-of-firearm-injuries-in-the-US-reaches-24493-billion-in-2020.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dddd69ac-abd2-42e5-9886-1ef99e33bcd6 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 14:14:51 -0500 Economic burden of firearm injuries in the US reaches $493 billion in 2020
